title: RVB SmartBot
description: RVB SmartBot is a mobile phone application of connecting the TARA cleaner robotic products, which supports the robotic customization products with WIFI function under the TARA brand. It can not only replace the traditional remote controller , but also can present more working data that cannot be displayed by the conventional remote controller. Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.

Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.
